twitch.replace_topic: There are currently {{clip_count}} {{clip_word}} submitted! | You can only post 1 clip per message!

noattachments.title: No attachments allowed
noattachments.desc: **{{dc_username}}** unfortunately, you cannot post attachments in here. This channel is only for Twitch clips.

usercanttalk.comment_: User cannot talk in the clips channel
usercanttalk.title: Something went wrong
usercanttalk.desc: **{{dc_username}}** unfortunately, you are not allowed to speak in here. This channel is only for Twitch clips.

clipalreadyexist.comment_: Clip already exist in the database (Server based).
clipalreadyexist.title: Something went wrong
clipalreadyexist.desc: **{{dc_username}}** The clip [{{twitch_url}}]({{twitch_url}}) has already been posted by **{{sender_dc_tag}}**

onlyfromstreamer.comment_: Allow only a specific clip from streamer only
onlyfromstreamer.title: Something went wrong
onlyfromstreamer.desc: **{{dc_username}}** Only the clips from {{system_broadcasters}} **{{twitch_broadcasters}}** can be placed here!

streamerblocked.comment_: The streamer has been blocked, so no clips of this streamer can be placed.
streamerblocked.title: Something went wrong
streamerblocked.desc: **{{dc_username}}** No clips from streamer **{{twitch_broadcaster}}** can be placed here.

testblock.comment_: The streamer has been blocked, so no clips of this streamer can be placed.
testblock.title: Something went wrong

status.desc: Get information about the status of Clip Manager.
